TopicTitle: 4 "drag information" lines on all parts info pop-ups on ship come from?

Articles.Content:
Some time in the past I activated a feature in a mod that added 4 lines of text to each parts info tab on my ship. (maybe 5)

the data looks like drag info.

Current Drag: 0.000kN

Cl: 0

Cd: 0

Cm: 0

isShielded: False

(The ship I got this info is in orbit so there is no drag)

Since then I have tried to figure out which mod did this so I can turn it off, but have been unable.

Anyone have an Idea which mod this is from?

Thanks

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-16T01:32:15Z" title="03/16/2015 01:32  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 16, 2015</time> by BlackHat**
"isShielded:" looks like normal FAR stuff for me. Other info looks similar to what FAR does, but it shouldn't show up on info tab though.
This was enabled by accident in some version of FAR.

Ok, I thought it was FAR, but could not find anything in the options to enable/disable it. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Hmm and a quick look at the FAR folder in Game Data does not show anything where it tells the game to display it either...

So How do I turn it off now? I would assume that FAR turned it on somewhere outside its folder, and so uninstalling/re-installing the mod now would not see to do it.

Maybe uninstalling it an re-installing that previous version would be necessary? Do you know which version had this accident?
The debug display was enabled by ferram4 accidentally, updating to the recent version should however hide it. Which version are you using?
Controls for those debug readouts are in the in-game FAR configuration window (FAR button in space center scene).

> 
> The debug display was enabled by ferram4 accidentally, updating to the recent version should however hide it. Which version are you using?

The latest version AFAIK. v14.6 through CKAN.

> 
> Controls for those debug readouts are in the in-game FAR configuration window (FAR button in space center scene).

I dont show the FAR button in the Space Center Scene. (maybe that was in the problem version)

Ok, I dont show the FAR button on the Space Center Scene, because I told it to use Blizzy's Toolbar instead of Stock. And Blizzys Tool bar is not showing up on the Space Center Scene.

I told it to use Blizzys, because the stock tool bar icon is just a black square for some reason.

Ok, uninstalling and re-installing FAR fixed the problem. (parts drag info is gone)

Apparently the black FAR icon was cause by ATM, I found a ATM config fix to take care of that.
